title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures steady as Wall Street cements in rate-cut hopes
description: Investors remain laser-focused on the Dec. 10 policy update from the Fed.
content:
US stock futures were in a holding pattern on Thursday as Wall Street waited for fresh data to test baked-in expectations that the Federal Reserve will deliver a December rate cut.
